data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Nashville to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Portland.
In Portland, [62] of [63] is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Portland a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Armando Villarreal signals a Nashville throw-in in Portland's half.
Goal kick for Portland at Providence Park.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nashville close to the penalty box.
Larrys Mabiala (Portland) gets a yellow card.
Nashville's Hany Mukhtar misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.

Throw-in Portland.
Throw-in for Nashville at Providence Park.
Goal! Portland have got their heads in front thanks to a Diego Valeri strike.
Andy Polo with an assist there.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to Nashville in their own half.
Nashville's [49] gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Portland have a goal kick.

Corner awarded to Nashville.

Portland needs to be cautious. Nashville have an attacking throw-in.

Throw-in for Portland in the half of Nashville.
Randall Leal for Nashville drives towards goal at Providence Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.

Nashville have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Randall Leal of Nashville gets in a strike, but is off target.
